# Interface STTNodeFactoryInterface

Interface for STT node factory parameters.

interface STTNodeFactoryInterface {  
executionConfig?: [STTNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.STTNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface);  
id: string;  
sttConfig: [RemoteSTTConfigInterface](./primitives_stt_config.RemoteSTTConfigInterface) | [LocalSTTConfigInterface](./primitives_stt_config.LocalSTTConfigInterface);  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/nodes/node_factory.STTNodeFactoryInterface))

    * STTNodeFactoryInterface

## Properties

### `Optional`executionConfig

executionConfig?: [STTNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.STTNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface)

Execution configuration for the STT node

### id

id: string

Unique identifier for the node

Inherited from [NodeFactoryInterface](./graph_nodes_node_factory.NodeFactoryInterface).[id](./graph_nodes_node_factory.NodeFactoryInterface#id)

### sttConfig

sttConfig: [RemoteSTTConfigInterface](./primitives_stt_config.RemoteSTTConfigInterface) | [LocalSTTConfigInterface](./primitives_stt_config.LocalSTTConfigInterface)

Configuration for the speech-to-text service (local or remote)
